comments.body:
Hello,

Tested your issue.  Alloy uses   [Backbone.js |http://docs.appcelerator.com/backbone/0.9.2/#Model] 
to provide support for  [models and collections|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Alloy_Collection_and_Model_Objects] .Alloy also borrows the concepts of  [migrations and adapters|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Alloy_Sync_Adapters_and_Migrations] from Rails for storage integration. 

Thanks
Please, you didn't address any question I have in this ticket. Please re-open this ticket. Thanks.
